text: Wrexham A.F.C. is a football club located in Wrexham, Wales but playing in the English league system. Wrexham are also the oldest Welsh club in football. After winning the championship of the fifth-level National League in the 2022–23 season, the club will play in EFL League Two in the 2023–24 season.https://www.espn.com/soccer/standings/_/league/ENG.5/season/2022 The club has received major international publicity since being purchased in November 2020 by American actor Rob McElhenney and Canadian–American actor Ryan Reynolds, with the purchase completed in February 2021. Their ownership of the club has since been the subject of the documentary series Welcome to Wrexham. The series airs on FX and Hulu in the United States and Disney+ in the UK and Ireland. == League position == Season League Position 2000–01 Second Division 10th 2001–02 Second Division 23rd 2002–03 Third Division 3th 2003–04 Second Division 13th 2004–05 League One 22nd 2005–06 League Two 13th 2006–07 League Two 19th 2007–08 League Two 24th 2008–09 Conference 10th === Former position === ==References== Category:English football clubs Category:1864 establishments in the United Kingdom Category:1860s establishments in Wales
title: Wrexham A.F.C.
